name: Soilwork
description: '''Soilwork''' is a Swedish [[melodic death metal]] band from [[Helsingborg]]. They have released twelve studio albums. Formed in late 1995 by [[Bj√∂rn Strid]] and [[Peter Wichers]], the band was originally known as ''Inferior Breed''. In late 1996, they changed their name to Soilwork, which means "working from the ground up".
